contents.item: Live every single moment of your life, for the one thing that is most precious to you.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar

contents.item: Don't wait for the right moment to start, start and make each moment right.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: I am fighting to stay alive not because I fear death, but because I love life.
contents.owner: Edie Littlefield Sundby, The Mission Walker: I was given three months to live...

contents.item: Most of us must learn to love people and use things rather than loving things and using people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Be where you are, stop over-thinking, and focus on what you are doing.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: You cannot change the past, but you can make a difference now
contents.owner: Avis J. Williams

contents.item: People are successful because they think and act like successful people.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Life teaches us the right path is rarely the easy one.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: The most important lessons are learned during the process. Pay attention to the process.
contents.owner: Kemi Sogunle, Beyond the Pain by Kemi Sogunle

contents.item: Travelling unveils new dimensions of this world not known to the naked eye.
contents.owner: Wayne Chirisa

contents.item: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most. You have to change your priorities over time.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Everything starts from inside of us, then comes outside of us.
contents.owner: Avis J. Williams

contents.item: If you do not have control over your mouth, you will not have control over your future.
contents.owner: Germany Kent

contents.item: Learn to be You. Why follow in someone else's footprints?
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: A rich life is lived from a giving heart not a selfish mind.
contents.owner: Rasheed Ogunlaru

contents.item: Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Luck, I believe, is where preparation meets opportunity.
contents.owner: Marcella Purnama, What I Wish I Had Known

contents.item: Don't over-focus on the negatives and under-focus the positives in your life.
contents.owner: Lalah Delia

contents.item: It takes guts and humility to admit mistakes. Admitting we're wrong is courage, not weakness.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Sometimes a man cannot live up to the best idea they dared to have
contents.owner: Javier Merizalde

contents.item: Let the improvement of yourself keep you so busy that you have no time to criticize others.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Stop doing what is easy or popular. Start doing what is right.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Integrity is doing what is right and truthful, and doing as you say you would do.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Courage is feeling fear, not getting rid of fear, and taking action in the face of fear.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Gratitude builds a bridge to abundance.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Be careful because brazen behavior and a powerful mind can hide a delicate heart.

contents.item: Think "Energy" before opening your mouth. Send out good vibes in every word you pronounce.
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: lessons of medicrity, to a great extent, produce students of mediocrity
contents.owner: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

contents.item: What matters most is that you take the journey (of self awareness and transformation).
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: The important thing is not to survive, but to live.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar

contents.item: The beginning is always NOW.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Do what you love, love what you do, and with all your heart give yourself to it.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Don't bite off more than you can chew because nobody looks attractive spitting it back out.
contents.owner: Carroll Bryant

contents.item: To fail is to not try at all.

contents.item: Be with someone who inspires you and makes you be the best version of yourself.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: There is a difference between how you live your life, and what you do with your life.
contents.owner: Abhijit Naskar

contents.item: Real love is a humble receptivity of a silent heart that is prepared to melt and merge…
contents.owner: Banani Ray, Awakening Inner Guru

contents.item: Life’s best lessons are learned during the most painful experiences.
contents.owner: Kemi Sogunle, Beyond the Pain by Kemi Sogunle

contents.item: Nourish your Nature. Be who you are meant to be.
contents.owner: Diana Dentinger, Modus Vivendi: Your Life Your Way

contents.item: A loud smile is often a fake laugh.
contents.owner: Saahil Prem

contents.item: To learn something new, you need to try new things and not be afraid to be wrong.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett

contents.item: Dream your own dreams, achieve your own goals. Your journey is your own and unique.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Everything is possible and impossible at the same time this is what we live with every time.

contents.item: Until you change how you get things done, you'll never know what works best.

contents.item: Don’t wait for things to happen. Make them happen.

contents.item: If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.

contents.item: Embracing change can be daunting, but it is our willingness to do better that makes it worthwhile.

contents.item: I help people achieve their dreams.

contents.item: The more you learn, the more you want to learn.

contents.item: Life changes us. To wish otherwise is pointless.
contents.owner: Nalini Singh, Angels Of Darkness

contents.item: You cannot change anyone, but you can be the reason someone changes.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: It is a rule of life that we eventually become victims of the evil we do to others.
contents.owner: Wayne Gerard Trotman

contents.item: It is better to do the will of God than seek your own ways.
contents.owner: Lailah Gifty Akita

contents.item: Your own shortcomings are the best ground to grow your sense of humor.

contents.item: To overcome fear is the quickest way to gain your self-confidence.

contents.item: What doesn't kill me provides writing material.

contents.item: You don’t have to like someone, but you have to treat them as you wish to be treated.

contents.item: Never wear a shoe that doesn't fit you

contents.item: Are we living life, or is life living us?

contents.item: Instead of complaining about the problem and blaming others, start finding the solution.

contents.item: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

contents.item: Who you were taught to be is not who you really are! How about learning to be you?

contents.item: Life is a rich literature.

contents.item: Stop making excuses and start doing what makes you profoundly happy!

contents.item: It is difficult to make the right choice if you fear choosing wrongly.

contents.item: Life is a journey filled with experiences but without the experiences, there will be no life.

contents.item: One can not come back from life.

contents.item: Open the window of your mind. Allow the fresh air,new lights and new truths to enter.

contents.item: Why don't we pay more attention to little children and be nice to each other.
contents.owner: Nurudeen Ushawu

contents.item: Integrity is doing the right thing when nobody's watching, and doing as you say you would do.
contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.owner: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

contents.item: Nothing can disturb your peace of mind unless you allow it to.

contents.item: All our wisdom is stored in the trees.

contents.item: The unhappiest people in this world, are those who care the most about what other people think.
